listAccomplishments.title: #hack19 - Flutter Hackathon Prague - 2nd place
listAccomplishments.text:
#hack19 Prague was a Flutter hackathon organized by [Inventi <Labs/>](http://ilabs.cz/)
[Vitaliy Misurenko](https://www.linkedin.com/in/vitaliymisurenko) and I had a few hours to pitch some flutter-community related idea, build an app and present it. To that point, both Vitaliy and I have never worked with Flutter before so learning on the go with the time running out was a really interesting experience. [The website](https://www.hack19prague.com/) of this event is down, but the event itself can be found [here](https://www.meetup.com/en-AU/Dart-Flutter-in-Prague/events/261347593/) and some press coverage [here](https://tyinternety.cz/kalendar-akci/hack19-international-flutter-hackathon-prague/) or [here](https://dotekomanie.cz/2019/05/hack19-international-hackathon-prague/).

listAccomplishments.title: Programming competition - 2nd place
listAccomplishments.text: Second place in district programming competition in Prague 2. 6th place from whole Prague. More details are [here](http://www.ddm-ph2.cz/souteze-soutez-v-programovani).

listJobs.title: Alza.cz - Front-End Web developer
listJobs.text:
## Tech-stack
- C#, ASP.Net
- T-SQL (MSSQL)
- HTML5
- SCSS, LESS, CSS
- AngularJS, TypeScript, JavaScript, jQuery

## Few words
After my intership at Alza.cz I've been accepted for a part-time position as a .Net web developer. I've been working on general improvements, fixing bugs and ond other tasks.
